sentence: Thats why Ron DeSantis is one step ahead: First, you ban the math textbooks.

sentence: He went on to skewer FOX anchors; former CNN host Chris Cuomo; anything to do with CNN +, which shuttered within a month of its launch; and Floridas Governor Ron DeSantis.
author: Terry Moseley
title: The Nations Most Distinguished Superspreader Event: The White House Correspondents Dinner Returns
